1.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to Bluetooth.

2.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the users calendar data.

3.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user's reminders.

4.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device's camera.

5.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device's microphone.

6.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user's contacts.

7.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to authenticate with Face ID.

8.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user's Desktop folder.

9.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user's Documents folder.

10.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user's Downloads folder.

11.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files on a network volume.

12.commonName: File acess to removeable volumes (external storage)
12.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files on a removable volume.

13.commonName: File acess to files managed by a file provider
13.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files managed by a file provider.

14.commonName: Access to Game Center friends list
14.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to their Game Center friends list

15.description: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to read clinical records.

16.description: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to read samples from the HealthKit store.

17.description: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to save samples to the HealthKit store.

18.description: The clinical record data types that your app must get permission to read.

19.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user's HomeKit configuration data.

20.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user's location information at all times.

21.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information

22.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information while the app is running in the foreground.

23.description: A collection of messages that explain why the app is requesting temporary access to the user’s location.

24.description: A Boolean value that indicates a widget uses the user’s location information.

25.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app requests reduced location accuracy by default.

26.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s media library.

27.description: message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s motion data.

28.description: A message to the user that explains the app’s request for permission to access fall detection event data.

29.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the local network.

30.description: A request for user permission to begin an interaction session with nearby devices.

31.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s NFC hardware.

32.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting add-only access to the user’s photo library.

33.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s photo library.

34.commonName: OS access to app files and Security Policy
34.description: A dictionary that identifies which apps or installer packages the operating system allows to write to the app’s bundle.

35.description: A message that informs the user why an app is requesting permission to use data for tracking the user or the device.

36.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to send Apple events.

37.description: A short description of the purpose of your app's research study.

38.description: A dictionary that includes keys for the specific information your app collects.

39.description: A hyperlink to a webpage that displays the privacy policy for your app's research study.

40.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting to send user data to Siri.

41.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting to send user data to Apple’s speech recognition servers.

42.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s TV provider account.

43.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting identity information.

1.description: A Boolean value indicating whether AppleScript is enabled.

2.description: The export compliance code provided by App Store Connect for apps that require it.

3.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the app uses encryption.

4.description: A message in macOS that tells the user why the app is requesting to manipulate the system configuration.

5.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the app requires a Wi-Fi connection.
